#A Short Introduction

= Compiling Ulib =

==Compiling Ulib on Linux OSes==
  # Untar/svn checkout the source.
  # cd ulib_src_dir/
  # make
 
At this time, you will have all necessary headers in ulib_src_dir/include/ and libraries in ulib_src_dir/lib/
